job_details.Functieomschrijving:
You participate in standups and refinements, develop code, enforce code quality, develop best practices, write tests and manage the continuous integration of code. As a Senior Engineer you support product or platform architects and are the technical point of contact for product owners and heads of tech. Beyond your own team, you contribute to the AH Tech community via Guilds, inner source initiatives, and more., * Are the Lead software engineer, guiding other back- and front-end developers in developing a feature-rich product for our employees.
     * Understand how to technically scale the services in the 'employee experience platform', which empowers the "@AH app".
     * Understand how to combine best agile development practices in combination with a services-based architecture.
     * Are an expert on 'your' domain (Kotlin back-end services on our Azure Kubernetes platform), though you can also liaise with other senior engineers and their respective technologies (Front and Back End).

   Why we believe this is a cool job
     * You get to work with modern technologies, and since this is a new-build solution we have zero legacy.
     * Everything we build in the app is scalable, using Azure and Microservices, Kubernetes, CI/CD pipelines. We work in small increments so we're able to put things live straight away, hence reduce our time to market.
     * We work in a multi-disciplinarian team; with dedicated QA, UX designer, developers, product owner. In total the team consists of 8+ people.
     * This initiative, building an employee app for your own colleagues, is a priority project for Albert Heijn, with the potential of scaling to other brands within Ahold Delhaize.
     * As a Senior engineer you have an impact on the direction of the (technical) part of the app. And the way we work in this project is a blueprint for other teams in our Retail Tech Platform. Therefore, we encourage you to share knowledge and best practices with other teams.

   What do you bring

   At AH Technology you'll be working for one of the biggest food retailers in the Netherlands. To be successful as our new senior back end engineer you bring
job_details.full_text:
Senior Backend Developer (Kotlin, Azure, Kafka)

You participate in standups and refinements, develop code, enforce code quality, develop best practices, write tests and manage the continuous integration of code. As a Senior Engineer you support product or platform architects and are the technical point of contact for product owners and heads of tech. Beyond your own team, you contribute to the AH Tech community via Guilds, inner source initiatives, and more., * Are the Lead software engineer, guiding other back- and front-end developers in developing a feature-rich product for our employees.
     * Understand how to technically scale the services in the 'employee experience platform', which empowers the "@AH app".
     * Understand how to combine best agile development practices in combination with a services-based architecture.
     * Are an expert on 'your' domain (Kotlin back-end services on our Azure Kubernetes platform), though you can also liaise with other senior engineers and their respective technologies (Front and Back End).

   Why we believe this is a cool job
     * You get to work with modern technologies, and since this is a new-build solution we have zero legacy.
     * Everything we build in the app is scalable, using Azure and Microservices, Kubernetes, CI/CD pipelines. We work in small increments so we're able to put things live straight away, hence reduce our time to market.
     * We work in a multi-disciplinarian team; with dedicated QA, UX designer, developers, product owner. In total the team consists of 8+ people.
     * This initiative, building an employee app for your own colleagues, is a priority project for Albert Heijn, with the potential of scaling to other brands within Ahold Delhaize.
     * As a Senior engineer you have an impact on the direction of the (technical) part of the app. And the way we work in this project is a blueprint for other teams in our Retail Tech Platform. Therefore, we encourage you to share knowledge and best practices with other teams.

   What do you bring

   At AH Technology you'll be working for one of the biggest food retailers in the Netherlands. To be successful as our new senior back end engineer you bring

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses heavily on traditional backend development, software engineering best practices, and cloud infrastructure (Azure, Kubernetes, Kafka, Kotlin). While it mentions 'employee experience platform' and 'app', there is no mention of Generative AI, LLMs, diffusion models, or related technologies. The role appears to be a Senior Backend Engineer position, not directly involved in AI model development or deployment, thus falling under the 'Ambiguous' category as it's not an AI-specific technical role.

job_tasks.justification: The description emphasizes 'develop code', 'enforce code quality', 'develop best practices', 'write tests', 'manage the continuous integration of code', 'Lead software engineer, guiding other back- and front-end developers', 'develop a feature-rich product', 'combine best agile development practices in combination with a services-based architecture', 'building backend services', and 'Microservices'. These are all core software development activities.

These are all core software development activities.

These are all core software development activities.

The phrase 'manage the continuous integration of code' directly relates to CI/CD pipelines, which are a fundamental part of MLOps and general DevOps practices for automated software deployment and integration.

The mention of 'Microservices, Kubernetes, CI/CD pipelines' points to operational aspects of deploying and managing software systems, which falls under MLOps/DevOps.
The phrase 'put things live straight away, hence reduce our time to market' implies a focus on efficient deployment and release cycles, a key aspect of MLOps.

The role involves being a 'technical point of contact for product owners and heads of tech' and contributing to the 'AH Tech community via Guilds, inner source initiatives', requiring strong communication and collaboration skills.
job_tasks.phrase: contribute to the AH Tech community via Guilds, inner source initiatives

The statement 'the way we work in this project is a blueprint for other teams in our Retail Tech Platform. Therefore, we encourage you to share knowledge and best practices with other teams' implies a need for ownership and proactive knowledge sharing.
